upperdiddle Swires was an infamous small and high-vaulting gnomish rascal who was active sometime in or before the late 15 century DR.
Lupperdiddle was known for his numerous daring raids and burglaries of henhouses. By the , and enchanted pair of boots called Swiresy shoes was in existence, possibly created and named in tribute to the diminutive cavorting thief. Another item from Lupperdiddles adventuring career was called Swires Sledboard, a flat shield that he once used to slide down a slope, away from his enemies. This shield would end up in stock at the Rivington General shop of Baldurs Gate.
